game.name: There Is mORE
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In this procedurally generated mining roguelite you dig for precious ores by day and defend your city from relentless monsters by night. Each night the waves attacking the core are getting deadlier - upgrade your gear, unlock powerful spells, and descend deeper. Can you survive 10 nights?
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this procedurally generated mining roguelite you dig for precious ores by day and defend your city from relentless monsters by night. Each night the waves attacking the core are getting deadlier - upgrade your gear, unlock powerful spells, and descend deeper. Can you survive 10 nights?
